#  Setup  

Set up workspace, load data, and load required packages. 
```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))

results <- read.csv("/Users/emilysesno/Desktop/Emily/USVI_Coral_Sampling/Data/Genotype_Samples_2022.csv", header=T, na.strings="NA")

library("plyr") 
library("dplyr")
library("tidyverse")
library("knitr")
library("tidyr")

library("janitor") #allows to group by Location (group_by wasn't working properly)

```


```{r data explore}

spcount <- 
  results %>% 
  select("VialID", "Species") %>% 
  separate(col=VialID, into=c('Location', 'SampNum'), sep='_') %>% 
  tabyl(Species, Location)




```
